sentences.sContent: She will face a local magistrate on Tuesday.
sentences.sCn: 她将在星期二面见一位地方治安法官。

synos.tran: 地方法官；文职官员；治安推事

remMethod.val: magistr(=master， 主人)+ate(做)→做当地的主人→地方官

words.tran: 地方行政官的职位；地方行政长官
长官的职位；地方行政长官

trans.tranCn: 地方法官；文职官员；治安推事
trans.tranOther: someone, not usually a lawyer, who works as a judge in a local court of law, dealing with less serious crimes
